trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time your device's alarm is turned on.
This Trigger fires every time your device's battery level falls below the value you specified.
This Trigger fires every time your device detects wind speed lower than the value you specified.
This Trigger fires every time your device's binary switch is turned off.
This Trigger fires every time your device detects a brightness level above the value you specified.
This Trigger fires every time your device's alarm is turned off.
This Trigger fires every time your device player's state changes to the value you specified.
This Trigger fires every time your device volume level is below the value you specified.
This Trigger fires every time your device detects a CO2 level above the value you specified.
This trigger fires when the Weather Station reports night.
This Trigger fires every time your device brightness level is below the value you specified.
This Trigger fires every time your device detects humidity levels lower than the threshold you specified.
This Trigger fires every time your device detects a luminescence level below the value you specified.
This Trigger fires every time your device detects a temperature below the value you specified.
This Trigger fires every time your device detects a CO2 level below the value you specified.
This trigger fires when the Weather Station reports day.
This Trigger fires every time your device detects humidity levels higher than the threshold you specified.
This Trigger fires every time your device detects a volume level above the value you specified.
This Trigger fires every time your device's binary switch is turned on.
This Trigger fires every time your device detects temperatures above the value you specified.
This Trigger fires every time your device is switched off.
This Trigger fires every time your device detects luminescence levels higher than the value you specified.
This Trigger fires every time your device's rain indicator turns off.
This Trigger fires every time your device's rain indicator turns on.
This Trigger fires every time your device is switched on.
This Trigger fires every time your device detects wind speed higher than the value you specified.
